channel.title: [508] Pulmonary [508]
channel.description:
[i][size=20pt]Pulmonary[/size][/i] IRC:
[19:21] sure, dont break any rules such as advertising, etc, and make sure you have proof that youve been working on a server, pictures etc [19:21] and <3 [19:21] from me to you
- Ofcourse it already has prayer, working friends list, NPC agression, following, ect.. Update List: *- Starting day of coding (June 8th) *- Cleaned up most of the useless files *- Npc Dialogue. (nothing much, first day of coding.) *- Decent client, minor updates. (I cba to code clients) *- Added dragon bolts (June 12th), hits are pretty close to runescape Dragon Bolt [IMG]http://i572.photobucket.com/albums/ss168/ProjectPulmonary/Dbolt.jpg[/img] - Post some suggestions for the server. I'm open for anything tbh.

item.title: [508] Pulmonary [508]
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Finally, i like to see these types of development threads. Especially the part where you start coding the day you release your thread. Once you get a little more coding done, and a little bit more information in your thread i will be able to post some suggestions for your server. Good luck with this project.

Read full topic
